chat_10230.content: As I walked through the school ground, I got more attention than I ever had before.
chat_10230.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10109.content: I could wait outside but I didn't want to get in any more trouble. Maybe he just didn't hear me.
chat_10109.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10228.content: Ha! I'd do anything to fade back into the shadows right about now...

chat_10107.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10108.content: I heard some noises from the ${1014}'s office. It sounded like someone else was in there.
chat_10108.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10347.content: ${1012} called her ${1007} pretending to be Jade's doctor and said Jade had an STD.

chat_10105.content: But today, all I'm getting is negative attention.
chat_10105.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10348.content: She now goes to an all girls Christian school in Alaska.

chat_10227.content: And if you want to stand out and be noticed, then I will support you.

chat_10106.content: I stand outside the office by the shut door and listen in.
chat_10106.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10224.content: Look, I wanted to talk to you about yesterday morning.

chat_10103.content: Ugh, today couldn't get any worse.
chat_10103.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10346.content: Last year, she accidentally scratched ${1012}'s car when pulling out of a parking space...

chat_10225.content: I should have never brought up your father on your first day of school. I'm sorry.

chat_10104.content: I can't believe this. The last six years have breezed by without anyone noticing me.
chat_10104.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10222.content: I...I don't want to talk about it.

chat_10101.content: Oh wow, the new girl has some sass.

chat_10102.content: I ignore his giggles and get up from my seat and walk to the ${1014}'s office.

chat_10341.content: I eye my rolls to Mol.

chat_10220.content: But that hell was about to await me. For now, I was alone with my ${1007} in her car as she drove me to school.

chat_10342.content: I don't know why you're rolling your eyes. You'd be scared of her too, if you were smart.

chat_10221.content: Are you ready to talk to me yet?

chat_10340.content: Not true! I am scared of ${1012} though...

option_10000.content: Are you sure you're not looking in the mirror?
option_10000.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

option_10003.content: Uhm... i'm sorry. but i was paying attention.

option_10001.content: I'm so sorry. it was a total accident and i didn't even see you.
option_10001.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10415.content: I've had the worst week, I'm pretty sure your girlfriend is going to kill me and now, I have four miles left to walk home.

option_10007.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10416.content: So if you could refrain from being a jerk for one minute, that would be great and appreciated.

option_10006.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10413.content: Can you just f*ck off for once?

chat_10411.content: It's ${1009}... He pulls up in car playing rap music.

chat_10412.content: One detention and you've already started working the streets.

chat_10410.content: After walking for 20 minutes, I hear a car pull up next to me.

chat_10408.content: I can't believe I'm going to have to walk.

chat_10409.content: And so I started my long walk home.

chat_10406.content: Suit yourself, I'm going to work. Find your own way home.

chat_10407.content: I stared in disbelief at my phone.

chat_10404.content: Are you going to be long? ${1015}, I have to go to work in twenty minutes, hurry up.

chat_10400.content: 6 new messages from ${1007}, 6 missed calls from ${1007}.

chat_10318.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10319.content: I think you have some explaining to do.
chat_10319.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10316.content: ${1012} walks up to the three of them - it's as if she knows whenever her name is mentioned.
chat_10316.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10317.content: Hey sugar, wanna give me a taste?
chat_10317.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10314.content: Take a chill pill man, it was a joke.
chat_10314.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10315.content: What are you gonna do dude? Are you gonna break up with her?
chat_10315.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10312.content: ${1009} raises his fist to ${1005}. ${1003} rolls his eyes.
chat_10312.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10313.content: Shut your mouth right now or next time, I'll break your jaw.
chat_10313.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10310.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10311.content: I take that as a no. Maybe ${1014} White does it better than you.
chat_10311.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10309.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10307.content: So did you get any of the good stuff from ${1012}?
chat_10307.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10429.content: I give up and slowly get in his car, feeling some butterflies in my heart...

chat_10308.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10426.content: What if I don't want a lift home?

chat_10305.content: And ${1015}, congratulations. You are now class president.

chat_10306.content: Elsewhere in the school, ${1009} stands talking with his two best friends, ${1005} and ${1003}.
chat_10306.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY

chat_10424.content: I stand still and feel sceptical.

chat_10425.content: I'm giving you a lift home, dumby.

chat_10304.content: You are to be stripped of your class presidency. It is to go to someone worthy of the title.

chat_10301.content: One more thing before you go, ${1012}...

user_select_dan_cloth_999.scene_content: INT. SCHOOL BLUE HALLWAY LOCKERS - DAY
